/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the scene, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees line the street, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, hinting at the city's dynamic rhythm. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
